description:
Because Chuta wasn’t careful, he ends up putting the ēlDLIVE solar system bureau and the Earth in danger. DeMille announces that they’re going to commence another attack on the Earth unless they and over the Monitalien and Chuta. Through guilt, Chuta considers just handing himself over, but then decides to work with everyone at the solar system bureau and stands up against the giant criminal organization. In order to protect the universe from the evil organization, the ēlDLIVE solar system bureau puts their plan into effect!
Source: crunchyroll
